title: my dream champion
body:
The time when Riven broke her blade of the sword, there is a young kid picked up, and crafted to a knife ( third wind technique champion). This kid wasn't born in a happy family his mother is the only one take carry of him, because his father left them and became a elder. when he was 11 year old his mother dies, and he need to take care of himself. from that day on he is always looking for his father to revenge.

champion skill

Passive
every time after he use a skill, next auto dealing extra damage  X/Y/Z% to his own maximum heath.

Q - 
Dashes to a location, and dealing damage to all enemies and knocking them back. 

W- Revenge
block incoming damage shield, and return 50% of damage to the attackers
 
E-
passive- dashes to the target with the first auto attacks, and enemies will gain a marks for 6 second. his cant dashes to the unit that got that mark.
 
R- Revenge counter
unable to cast or use any champion spell and passive for 3 second, dealing that time, he becomes immune to disables. after 3 second he gain attack damage ( ad+% of damage he toke from the last 3 second) and he gain the ability to use wind slice, dealing all the damage and the damage he toke from the last 3 second to all enemies on the way
